field.name: DUTY
field.description: LCD duty select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b000
enumeratedValue.description: Use 1 BP (1/1 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b001
enumeratedValue.description: Use 2 BP (1/2 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b010
enumeratedValue.description: Use 3 BP (1/3 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b011
enumeratedValue.description: Use 4 BP (1/4 duty cycle). (Default)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b100
enumeratedValue.description: Use 5 BP (1/5 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b101
enumeratedValue.description: Use 6 BP (1/6 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b110
enumeratedValue.description: Use 7 BP (1/7 duty cycle)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b111
enumeratedValue.description: Use 8 BP (1/8 duty cycle)

field.name: LCLK
field.description: LCD Clock Prescaler

field.name: SOURCE
field.description: LCD Clock Source Select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Selects the default clock as the LCD clock source

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Selects the alternate clock as the LCD clock source

field.name: LCDEN
field.description: LCD Driver Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: All frontplane and backplane pins are disabled. The LCD controller system is also disabled, and all LCD waveform generation clocks are stopped. VLL3 is connected to VDD internally

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LCD controller driver system is enabled, and frontplane and backplane waveforms are generated. All LCD pins, LCD_Pn, enabled using the LCD pin enable register, output an LCD driver waveform.The backplane pins output an LCD driver backplane waveform based on the settings of DUTY[2:0]. Charge pump or resistor bias is enabled

field.name: LCDSTP
field.description: LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator while in Stop mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Allows the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator to continue running during Stop mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Disables the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator when MCU enters Stop mode

field.name: LCDWAIT
field.description: LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator stop while in Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Allows the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator to continue running during Wait mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Disables the LCD driver, charge pump, resistor bias network, and voltage regulator when MCU enters Wait mode

field.name: ALTDIV
field.description: LCD AlternateClock Divider

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Divide factor = 1 (No divide)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Divide factor = 8

field.name: FDCIEN
field.description: LCD Fault Detection Complete Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No interrupt request is generated by this event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When a fault is detected and FDCF bit is set, this event causes an interrupt request

field.name: LCDIEN
field.description: LCD Frame Frequency Interrupt Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No interrupt request is generated by this event

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When LCDIF bit is set, this event causes an interrupt request

field.name: VSUPPLY
field.description: Voltage Supply Control

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Drive V LL2 internally from V DD

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Drive V LL3 internally from V DD

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Reserved

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Drive V LL3 externally from V DD or drive V LL1 internally from V IREG

field.name: LADJ
field.description: Load Adjust

field.name: HREFSEL
field.description: High Reference Select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Divide input, V IREG = 1.0 V for 3 V glass

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Do not divide the input, V IREG = 1.67 V for 5 V glass

field.name: CPSEL
field.description: Charge Pump or Resistor Bias Select

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LCD charge pump is disabled. Resistor network selected. (The internal 1/3-bias is forced.)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LCD charge pump is selected. Resistor network disabled. (The internal 1/3-bias is forced.)

field.name: RVTRIM
field.description: Regulated Voltage Trim

field.name: RVEN
field.description: Regulated Voltage Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Regulated voltage disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Regulated voltage enabled

field.name: BRATE
field.description: Blink-rate configuration

field.name: BMODE
field.description: Blink mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Display blank during the blink period

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Display alternate display during blink period (Ignored if duty is 5 or greater)

field.name: BLANK
field.description: Blank display mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal or alternate display mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Blank display mode

field.name: ALT
field.description: Alternate display mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Normal display mode

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Alternate display mode

field.name: BLINK
field.description: Blink command

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disables blinking

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Starts blinking at blinking frequency specified by LCD blink rate calculation

field.name: LCDIF
field.description: LCD Frame Frequency Interrupt flag

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Frame frequency interrupt condition has not occurred

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The start of LCD controller frame has occurred

field.name: FDPINID
field.description: Fault Detect Pin ID

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Fault detection for LCD_P0 pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Fault detection for LCD_P1 pin

field.name: FDBPEN
field.description: Fault Detect Back Plane Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Type of the selected pin under fault detect test is front plane

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Type of the selected pin under fault detect test is back plane

field.name: FDEN
field.description: Fault Detect Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Disable fault detection

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Enable fault detection

field.name: FDSWW
field.description: Fault Detect Sample Window Width

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Sample window width is 4 sample clock cycles

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Sample window width is 8 sample clock cycles

field.name: FDPRS
field.description: Fault Detect Clock Prescaler

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: 1/1 bus clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: 1/2 bus clock

field.name: FDCNT
field.description: Fault Detect Counter

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No "one" samples

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: 1 "one" samples

field.name: FDCF
field.description: Fault Detection Complete Flag

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Fault detection is not completed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Fault detection is completed

field.name: PEN
field.description: LCD Pin Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LCD operation disabled on LCD_Pn

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LCD operation enabled on LCD_Pn

field.name: PEN
field.description: LCD Pin Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: LCD operation disabled on LCD_Pn

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: LCD operation enabled on LCD_Pn

field.name: BPEN
field.description: Back Plane Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Front plane operation enabled on LCD_Pn

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Back plane operation enabled on LCD_Pn

field.name: BPEN
field.description: Back Plane Enable

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Front plane operation enabled on LCD_Pn

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Back plane operation enabled on LCD_Pn

field.name: WF0
field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P0 as described above for WF3

field.name: WF1
field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P1 as described above for WF3

field.name: WF2
field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P2 as described above for WF3

field.name: WF3
field.description: Segment-on front plane operation - Each bit turns on or off the segments associated with LCD_P3 in the following pattern: HGFEDCBA (most significant bit controls segment H and least significant bit controls segment A). Segment-on back plane operation - Each bit activates or deactivates the phases associated with LCD_P3 in the following pattern: HGFEDCBA (most significant bit controls phase H and least significant bit controls phase A). For each bit: 0 Segment off or phase deactivated 1 Segment on or phase activated

field.name: WF4
field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P4 as described above for WF3TO0[WF3]

field.name: WF5
field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P5 as described above for WF3TO0[WF3]

field.description: Controls segments or phases connected to LCD_P6 as described above for WF3TO0[WF3]
